General.Name: Kid ASA
General.Description: Kid ASA, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a home textile retailer in Norway, Sweden, Finland, and Estonia. It designs, sources, markets, and sells a range of home and interior products, including textiles, curtains, bed linens, home accessories, decorations, furniture, and other interior products through retail stores and online platforms. The company provides its products under the Kid, Hemtex, Dekosol, Nordun, and Premium Collection brands. It also offers logistics services. The company was formerly known as Nordisk Tekstil Holding AS and changed its name to Kid ASA. Kid ASA was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in Lier, Norway.

7.Name: Stian  Brandhagen
7.Title: Head of Sustainability & Supply Chain Management
